the capital city of the US state of New York: Born in Albany, New York, Long was one of five brothers. This event is one of the largest we have ever produced here in Albany.
More examplesFewer examplesShe grew up in Albany.He spent five years working as a nurse in Albany.He decided to stay with his older sister in Albany.The new governor took the oath at the state assembly building in Albany.
